key_risks: Reliance on plastics and non-biodegradable materials despite sustainability initiatives
Volatility in raw material prices, particularly paperboard and plastics
Exposure to varying environmental and packaging regulations across 85 countries
Legal challenges, including allegations of racial and national origin discrimination
controversies: Criticism for environmental impact due to reliance on plastics
Legal allegations of racial and national origin discrimination
environmental_issues: Dependence on non-biodegradable materials, especially in the Asia-Pacific region
Transition challenges from plastic packaging to sustainable alternatives
social_issues: Allegations of racial and national origin discrimination by a former employee
governance_issues: Operational and financial challenges from strategic divestitures and acquisitions
